title: Christs napkin: or, A sermon preached in Kirkcubright at the Communion, May 12. 1633. By that flower of the Church; famous, famous, Mr. Samuel Rutherfurd. Never before printed
author: Rutherford, Samuel, 1600?-1661.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library and the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
